quote: The President has no intention -- the President has released plenty of information and I think has given more financial disclosure than anybody else.  I think the American population has plenty of information on this.
quotePlain: The President has no intention – the President has released plenty of information and I think has given more financial disclosure than anybody else.  I think the American population has plenty of information on this.
name: Steve Mnuchin

checks.quote: Trump released a financial disclosure report that all presidential candidates are required to fill out, but the fact that Trump has not released any tax filings undermines Munchin’s claim.
checks.quotePlain: Trump released a financial disclosure report that all presidential candidates are required to fill out, but the fact that Trump has not released any tax filings undermines Munchin’s claim.

claims.title: Donald Trump has provided more financial disclosure than anyone
claims.negative: Donald Trump has not provided more financial disclosure than anyone
claims.negativePlain: Donald Trump has not provided more financial disclosure than anyone
claims.truth: Trump has not released his tax returns, which every major-party nominee for the past 4 decades has done.
claims.truthPlain: Trump has not released his tax returns, which every major-party nominee for the past 4 decades has done.
